<!-- Button to download PDF -->
<button id="download-btn" onclick="downloadPDF()">Download PDF</button>
<!-- JavaScript function to handle the download -->
<script>
function downloadPDF() {
   // Path to your PDF file (relative)
   var pdfPath = '../paper_pdf_jpeg/Crabtree_Diet_2024.pdf';
   // Create a temporary link to trigger the download
   var link = document.createElement('a');
   link.href = pdfPath;
   link.download = 'Crabtree_Diet_2024.pdf';  // Optionally, specify the file name
   // Append the link to the body (required for it to work in some browsers)
   document.body.appendChild(link);
   // Trigger the click event to start the download
   link.click();
   // Remove the link from the DOM after the download starts
   document.body.removeChild(link);
}
</script>
